title: Bediani Vardischala St. George Church
about: Bediani Vardischala St. George Church is located in Bediani, Tsalka municipality, Kvemo Kartli region. It is a hall church, with annexes to the south and west. The church had traces of late conversion. Various architectural details can be found in the walls of the temple, which are clearly displaced. The church has windows to the west and east. The west window was larger and was later rebuilt. At the top of the east window, there is a folded headboard and a cross relief. The annex also has a window. The entrance is from the south. The south annex has an arched entrance, while the church itself is architrave. The floor of the sanctuary is one step higher than the floor of the hall. The church is built of cobblestone.
